name: gtk-doc
description:
GtkDoc is a tool used to extract API documentation from C-code like
Doxygen, but handles documentation of GObject (including signals and
properties) that makes it very suitable for GTK+ apps and libraries. It
uses docbook for intermediate files and can produce html by default and
pdf/man-pages with some extra work.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: py-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependencies.name: libxslt
dependencies.description:
Libxslt is the XSLT C library developed for the GNOME project. XSLT
itself is a an XML language to define transformation for XML. Libxslt is
based on libxml2 the XML C library developed for the GNOME project. It
also implements most of the EXSLT set of processor-portable extensions
functions and some of Saxon's evaluate and expressions extensions.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependent_to.name: librsvg
dependent_to.description: Library to render SVG files using Cairo

dependent_to.name: libcroco
dependent_to.description: Libcroco is a standalone css2 parsing and manipulation library.

dependent_to.name: ctpl
dependent_to.description:
CTPL is a template engine library written in C and distributed under the
terms of the GNU GPL.
